submit.description:
Build Stuff Tech Radar

Share your opinion!

Each on a radar is called a blip that is positioned in a quadrant:

  • Tools
  • Languages and Frameworks
  • Platforms
  • Techniques
Each quadrant is divided into four rings: Avoid, Assess, Trial and Adopt.

Share your point of view and vote for an existing placement or add a new one.
